page.title: 11DAY IN THE LIFE OF MR.GOODEY
page.content: I woke up at{6.30a.m.}got dressed and had my breakfast. I put my waterproof trousers on to water the{cacti and {plants.}I finished at{9.00a.m.}and opened the{nursery.}No sooner had I opened, than one of my workers arrived. Now I could go and repot some {cacti.}When I looked at my watch again it was{12.30p.m.}so I went for dinner. I finished at{1.30p.m.}Suddenly the phone rang. It was someone to say the van was ready for hiring. I collected it, brought it home and started to load it with{cacti}because I was going to a show the next day. I had my tea at{4.30p.m.}I did some watering, finishing at{8.00p.m.}At{10.00p.m.}I went to bed, after having watched television.
